Class ArrayMethods

java.lang.Object
ArrayMethods
public class ArrayMethods
extends java.lang.Object
Array Method Class The class is used manage arrays Methods in this class are used to append new values to an existing array These methods create a new array, duplicate the values of the existing array and returns the new array with the added value on the last index of the new array
Version:
1.00, 27 July 2021
Author:
Chris Joubert

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ArrayMethods()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static java.math.BigDecimal[] addToBigDecimalArray​(java.math.BigDecimal[] passedArray, java.math.BigDecimal numToAdd)
    Add To BigDecimal Array Method
    The method returns a new array matching the values of and indexes of the passed array The passed BigDecimal is added to the last index in the new array
    static boolean[] addToBoolArray​(boolean[] passedArray, boolean boolToAdd)
    Add To Boolean Array Method
    The method returns a new array matching the values of and indexes of the passed array The passed boolToAdd is added to the last index in the new array
    static int[] addToIntArray​(int[] passedArray, int intToAdd)
    Add To Int Array Method
    The method returns a new array matching the values of and indexes of the passed array The passed intToAdd is added to the last index in the new array
    static java.lang.String[] addToStringArray​(java.lang.String[] passedArray, java.lang.String stringToAdd)
    Add To String Array Method
    The method returns a new array matching the values of and indexes of the passed array The passed stringToAdd is added to the last index in the new array

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • ArrayMethods

      public ArrayMethods()

  • Method Details

    • addToBoolArray

      public static boolean[] addToBoolArray​(boolean[] passedArray, boolean boolToAdd)
      Add To Boolean Array Method
      The method returns a new array matching the values of and indexes of the passed array The passed boolToAdd is added to the last index in the new array
      Parameters:
      passedArray - Boolean Array containing all the values that need to be included in the new array
      boolToAdd - Boolean to be appended to the new array
      Returns:
      Boolean Array containing all original values and the passed value appended on the last index
      Since:
      version 1.00

    • addToIntArray

      public static int[] addToIntArray​(int[] passedArray, int intToAdd)
      Add To Int Array Method
      The method returns a new array matching the values of and indexes of the passed array The passed intToAdd is added to the last index in the new array
      Parameters:
      passedArray - Int Array containing all the values that need to be included in the new array
      intToAdd - Int to be appended to the new array
      Returns:
      Int Array containing all original values and the passed value appended on the last index
      Since:
      version 1.00

    • addToStringArray

      public static java.lang.String[] addToStringArray​(java.lang.String[] passedArray, java.lang.String stringToAdd)
      Add To String Array Method
      The method returns a new array matching the values of and indexes of the passed array The passed stringToAdd is added to the last index in the new array
      Parameters:
      passedArray - String Array containing all the values that need to be included in the new array
      stringToAdd - String to be appended to the new array
      Returns:
      String Array containing all original values and the passed value appended on the last index
      Since:
      version 1.00

    • addToBigDecimalArray

      public static java.math.BigDecimal[] addToBigDecimalArray​(java.math.BigDecimal[] passedArray, java.math.BigDecimal numToAdd)
      Add To BigDecimal Array Method
      The method returns a new array matching the values of and indexes of the passed array The passed BigDecimal is added to the last index in the new array
      Parameters:
      passedArray - BigDecimal Array containing all the values that need to be included in the new array
      numToAdd - BigDecimal to be appended to the new array
      Returns:
      BigDecimal Array containing all original values and the passed value appended on the last index
